rWCVPdata 0.6.0

Package index

All functions

coast
Aggregated WGSRPD3 polygons, for mapping
coast_pacific
Aggregated WGSRPD3 polygons centered on 180 longitude, for mapping
wcvp_check_version()
Check if the packaged version of WCVP is up to date.
wcvp_distributions
The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: distributions
wcvp_names
The World Checklist of Vascular Plants: names
wcvp_version()
Functions to help check the WCVP data is okay and up to date. View the version of WCVP available.
wgsrpd3
Biodiversity Information Standards (TDWG) World Geographical Scheme for Recording Plant Distributions (WGSRPD)
wgsrpd3_pacific
Biodiversity Information Standards (TDWG) World Geographical Scheme for Recording Plant Distributions (WGSRPD), centered on 180 longitude
